Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and his alter ego Duke O'Dowd, setting up his dual life and the initial conflicts he faces, including an ambush and his transformation into a superhero.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of the Human Meteor and Duke's Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the main character and his double life, starting with the comic book cover and transitioning to Duke's taxi driving job and initial fare.

sub_scenes.title: Ambush and Transformation at the Pier
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the sudden attack on Duke at the pier, his transformation into the Human Meteor, and his immediate response.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Ambush at the Pier

sub_scenes.title: Pier Confrontation and Hospital Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the Human Meteor's fight with the attackers, the police response, and the briefing about a new mission at the hospital.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration Planning and Initial Stowaway
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Duke's plan to infiltrate the yacht, his preparation with Toby, and the initial stage of stowing away.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht and Submarine Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the unfolding events on the yacht and the underwater mission to investigate the submarine threat, involving Toby's undercover work and Human Meteor's intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Undercover Yacht Infiltration and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Toby's actions on the yacht, his discovery of the submarine plot, and his capture.

sub_scenes.title: Revelation of Toby's Mission and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Toby's true identity and mission, his discovery of the submarine, and the plan to involve Human Meteor.

narrative_arcs.title: Return, Submarine Discovery, and Mission Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Intervention and Allied Divers
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor diving to confront the submarine threat, joined by allied divers as part of Toby's plan.

sub_scenes.title: Submarine Crew's Activity and Underwater Combat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the enemy's activity around the submarine, preparing torpedoes, and the initial underwater confrontation with Human Meteor and his allies.

sub_scenes.title: Submarine Attack and Shipboard Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Human Meteor's attack on the submarine, followed by concerns and reactions on the yacht regarding Peter's condition and the geyser.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Boarding and Depth Map Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor shifting his focus to the ship and then boarding the yacht to investigate Peter's situation and search for the depth map.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Return Home
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene wraps up the immediate aftermath, including informing the Navy, a speedboat journey, visiting Holden in the hospital, and the peaceful return home.

narrative_arcs.title: Informing the Navy about Peter's Map
Evening Drive and Bedtime for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and Ambulance Emergency
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline involving the Liberty Lads in conflict and an ambulance emergency, seemingly unrelated to the Human Meteor story initially.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a combat scenario with the Liberty Lads fighting Nazi Fiends.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Concern
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a separate storyline with an ambulance arriving and boys observing, creating a sense of mystery and concern.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Clue and Bus Garage Mystery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene progresses the ambulance storyline with the discovery of a wallet and a clue leading to a bus garage, initiating a new investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Discovery and Bus Garage Clue

sub_scenes.title: Bus Chase and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the boys chasing a bus to return the wallet, followed by police intervention and a change of direction.

narrative_arcs.title: Chasing the Bus for Wallet Return

sub_scenes.title: Mr. Horst's Office and Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene moves to Mr. Horst's office, where the boys are taken, and introduces a sense of threat and impending danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Waiting on the Bench and Approaching Threat

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Violent Plot against Boys
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Mr. Horst's interrogation of the boys and the escalating threat with a violent plan discussed.

sub_scenes.title: Major Bronson's Intervention and Carbon Monoxide Plot
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sees Major Bronson intervening, initially seeming to help but then proposing a different, deadly plan involving carbon monoxide.

sub_scenes.title: Fight, Capture, and Bronson's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a fight breaking out, the boys being captured, and Major Bronson's sudden violent betrayal of Horst's men.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Melee and Call to Stop

sub_scenes.title: Escape for Help and Secret Office Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the boys splitting up, with one seeking help from Marines while the other discovers a secret office revealing sabotage plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Marine Help at the Waterfront
Discovery and Confrontation in the Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Attack and Skip's Defense
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts an attack on the Marine Barracks and Skip's attempt to defend himself amidst the chaos.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Intervention and Resolution of Nazi Plot
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the Marines intervening, a fight ensues, and ultimately the Nazi spy ring is dismantled, resolving the immediate threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Congratulations for Stopping Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Champ and Henry in a new adventure set in South America, involving intrigue, kidnapping, and conflict with Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to South American Setting and Rosita's Kidnapping
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the scene in South America, introduces Champ and Henry's involvement in intrigue, and reveals the kidnapping of Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry in Intrigue

sub_scenes.title: Officers' Suspicious Actions and Rosita Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows officers acting suspiciously, arresting and questioning civilians while investigating Rosita's disappearance.

sub_scenes.title: Champ and Henry's Escort and Explanation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Champ and Henry being escorted to the American Consul and receiving an explanation about Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Escort to Consul and Investigation Inquiry
Explanation of Rosita's Kidnapping and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Plot and Mama's Deception
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals El Tigre's plan and shows Champ and Henry being captured and taken to a house where they meet 'Mama', seemingly connected to Rosita.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the planning to locate El Tigre and the subsequent infiltration of his hideout, using stage dollars as a diversion.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Approach to El Tigre
Approaching Guards and Confrontation with El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Twist, and Search for Rosita
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the interrogation of a man believed to be El Tigre, a twist revealing he is not, and a parallel search for Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Twist Regarding Axis Agents

sub_scenes.title: Clarification, Rescue Mission, and Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene clarifies El Tigre's role, initiates a rescue mission for Rosita, and depicts the pursuit of Axis agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Misunderstanding and Clarification about El Tigre
Rosita's Location Revealed and Rescue Mission Initiated

sub_scenes.title: Citadel Strategy and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on strategic maneuvering towards the Citadel and the eventual rescue of Rosita from Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Combat, Gratitude, and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts close combat, Rosita's rescue, her gratitude, Champ's promotion, and the arrival of government forces, leading to the resolution of the Axis threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Government Forces and Manhunt

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new character, Devil Dog Dolan, in a jungle setting, focusing on his military mission, disobedience, and confrontation with natives.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Military Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and shifts to a military briefing discussing his actions and situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat and Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Justification and Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Dolan's justification for disobeying orders and shows other officers expressing trust in his intentions.

narrative_arcs.title: Reassurance and Trust in Dolan's Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Arrival, Observation, and Hidden Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan's arrival in the jungle, initial observations, and the introduction of hidden threats and unease.

sub_scenes.title: Native Ambush and Soldier's Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a soldier being ambushed and captured by natives in the jungle.

sub_scenes.title: Captured Soldier and Sinister Grauer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the captured soldier being brought before Sinister Grauer, a new antagonist.

sub_scenes.title: Suspicion of Dolan and Interrogation Orders
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows soldiers suspecting Dolan and a commanding figure issuing orders for interrogation to extract plans.

sub_scenes.title: Torture and Plan Extraction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the brutal torture of the captured soldier and the successful extraction of the plans.

sub_scenes.title: Arson Confession and Marine Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces arson, a marine attack, and the initial reactions to these events.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine's Attack and Attempt to Stop Him
Burning Native Huts and Flames' Surge
Arsonist's Gloating and Reassurance to Sam

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Surprise Attack and Native Chief's Death
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Devil Dog Dolan launching a surprise attack on natives, leading to a fight and the accidental death of the native chief.

narrative_arcs.title: Chief's Death and Native Homage to Marine
Explanation of Chief's Betrayal and Liberation
Post-Conflict Dialogue and Pursuit of Grauer

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Dilemma and Sam's Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a shipboard setting, showing the Captain's dilemma, his son's pleas, and Sam's violent reaction and fight.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Disciplinary Action for Officer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the shipboard conflict, rescinds the surrender order, and depicts Dolan's disciplinary action against an officer.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering racketeering and seeking justice.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Initial Case Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and sets up their new case - the banker murder mystery, starting with a chaotic city scene and news assignment.

narrative_arcs.title: The News Assignment and Initial Clues

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Investigation and Barnacci Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the twins' investigation at the hospital, visiting Reilly's sick daughter, and developing suspicion towards Barnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Investigation and Miss Reilly's Condition

sub_scenes.title: Phoning Elijah and Startling News
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Dan calling Elijah for investigation and the startling news confirming Farnacci's gang's involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store

sub_scenes.title: Search in Irish Section and Mrs. Murphy's Information
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the twins searching for Reilly in the Irish section and meeting Mrs. Murphy who provides crucial information exonerating Reilly and implicating Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Farnacci's Blood Transfusion and Mob Threat

sub_scenes.title: Reilly's Escape and Car Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Reilly attempting to escape, initiating a car chase with Dan and Diane pursuing.

sub_scenes.title: Street Brawl and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a separate street brawl and the subsequent police intervention and arrests, seemingly a side event.

sub_scenes.title: Police Apprehension and Emergency Transport
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the police apprehending vehicles from the chase and the emergency transport of a shooting victim.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion Crisis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the anxious wait at the hospital, the revelation of Mrs. Murphy's need for blood transfusion, and the initial blood mismatch problem.

narrative_arcs.title: Diagnosis: Blood Transfusion Needed for Mrs. Murphy
Seeking Blood Donors and Initial Mismatch

sub_scenes.title: Community Blood Donation and Reilly's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the community responding to the blood donation appeal, successful blood transfusions, and Tom Reilly's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgent Call for Blood Donors for Tom Reilly
Community Response and Arrival of Blood Donors
Blood Type Verification and Donation Process
Blood Transfusion and Tom Reilly's Recovery
Anticipation of Tom Reilly Revealing Information

sub_scenes.title: Justice for Farnacci and Reilly's Daughter's Party
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the storyline with the demand for justice against Farnacci, police action to arrest him, and a celebratory birthday party for Reilly's recovered daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Justice and Plan to Capture Farnacci
Police Pursuit and Raid to Arrest Farnacci
Confrontation and Apprehension at the Poolroom
Celebratory Birthday Party for Reilly's Daughter
